attributionInfo.brokerName: Slifer Smith & Frampton - Slifer House Avon

data.description:
This charming 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom condo captures breathtaking views of the picturesque Colorado Rockies in Avon, creating an ideal destination for those seeking a perfect mountain getaway. Abundant natural light fills the home through windows that frame stunning views of Beaver Creek, Bachelor Gulch, and Arrowhead. Step into the loft-style, open-concept floor plan, featuring high ceilings that enhance the spacious living area. The kitchen/dining areas serve as a focal point for family living and entertaining, with numerous windows providing a bright and inviting atmosphere.
Conveniently positioned near some of the world's premier public golf courses, the Eagle Vail golf course is just 4 miles away, the Vail Golf course is 10 miles away, Eagle Ranch Golf course in Eagle is a short 25-minute drive, and Gypsum Creek Golf course is accessible within 30 minutes. Additionally, horseback riding is available at Beaver Creek.
Indulge in the Beaver Creek Resort lifestyle right outside your door or venture just 6 miles to the charming Vail Village Ski Resort. For holders of the Ikon Ski pass, accessing other resorts is remarkably convenient. With only an hour's drive from Breckenridge and a two-hour journey from Denver, coupled with easy access to the Eagle airport, this location seamlessly offers an escape from the city to the serene mountain environment of the Vail Valley.
Situated in the heart of the Vail Valley, this tranquil mountain retreat allows you to relish the ski resort experience right from your Avon home. Just 1.5 miles from Beaver Creek ski area and a short 6 miles from Vail Mountain ski resort, this location provides effortless access to the thrill of the slopes. Enjoy the ski resort ambiance from the comfort of your Avon residence, with convenient access to Eagle airport.
Centrally located in the valley, this condo offers year-round adventures for winter and summer sports enthusiasts. Easy access to world-class skiing on Beaver Creek and Vail mountains, along with hiking, biking, and rafting opportunities just steps away.  With ample storage for your outdoor gear and toys.
 The condo includes a dedicated garage space with ample storage for your outdoor gear and toys.
Additional features include a gas stove, a new refrigerator, a dishwasher just 2 years old, an in-unit laundry room, wood floors, and a window in the kitchen. The condo is meticulously maintained, ensuring a comfortable and inviting mountain retreat.
